commit.message: "Bug 1298345 - Refactor CanvasRenderingContext2D's texture allocation code. r=Bas0e23b73"

diff:
"0e23b73 335443 - support <link> autodetection of search engines patch by Pam Greene <pamg.bugs@gmail.com> r=brettw@gmail.com sr=ben@mozilla.org
diff --git a/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml b/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
index b477e22..d7ed6c2 100644
--- a/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
+++ b/browser/base/content/tabbrowser.xml
@@ -214,6 +214,18 @@
         </body>
       </method>
 
+      <method name="getBrowserForDocument">
+        <parameter name="aDocument"/>
+        <body>
+          <![CDATA[
+            var index = this.getBrowserIndexForDocument(aDocument);
+            if (index < 0)
+              return null;
+            return this.getBrowserAtIndex(index);
+          ]]>
+        </body>
+      </method>
+
       <method name="getNotificationBox">
         <parameter name="aBrowser"/>
         <body>
"
